Package scheduler.dao

Interface AppointmentDAO

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    DBAppointment
    public interface AppointmentDAO
    Interface for retrieving Appointment data from the database.

        boolean createAppointment​(java.lang.String title,

                          Appointment.Type type,
                          Customer customer,
                          Contact contact,
                          User user,
                          java.time.LocalDateTime start,
                          java.time.LocalDateTime end)
        Creates an appointment in the database.
        Parameters:
        title - the title
        description - the description
        location - the location
        type - the type
        customer - the customer
        contact - the contact
        user - the user
        start - the start date and time
        end - the end date and time
        Returns:
        true if the creation of the appointment is successful
